pages.text: $(li)The Iron Chisel is a tool that can be used to create new variations of blocks.$(br)$(li)You can left click click on any Chisel compatible block to convert it into a Chiseled version.
$(li)If you shift left click, the Chiseled block will rollback.

$(li)Just right click it to open a new GUI.$(br)$(li)In this GUI you can place any kind of block.$(br)$(li)If this block is compatible with Chisel, new variants of that block will appear.$(br)$(li)Just click on one of them to transform your blocks into a Chiseled version.
